column2:
```r
data_united %>% 
  select(status, everything())  %>% 
  summarise_all(funs(sum(!is.na(.)))) %>% 
  gather(key, n) %>% 
  ggplot(aes(n)) + 
  geom_bar() 

data_united %>% 
  group_by(status) %>%  
  select(everything()) %>%  # replace to your needs
  summarise_all(funs(sum(!is.na(.)))) %>% 
  gather(key, value, -status) %>% 
  ggplot(aes(value)) + geom_bar(aes(fill = status)) + facet_wrap(~ status, scales = \free\")
